text: Vytautė Genovaitė Žilinskaitė"LIETUVOS RESPUBLIKOS PREZIDENTAS DEKRETAS <...>, June 22, 2005, No. 348" (born December 13 , 1930, Kaunas ) is a Lithuanian prose writer, humorist, and children's literature writer.Vytautė Žilinskaitė ==Awards== *1965: Vincas Mickevičius-Kapsukas Prize by the Lithuanian Union of Journalists"Что надо сделать для того, чтобы Россия перестала быть «замком лгунов»?" ["What Is to be Done for Russia Ceased to be the Castle of Liars?"], zavtra.ru for "Mano neapykanta stipresnė" ["My hatred is stronger: a documentary about the activities of the Raseiniai underground communist youth organization"] *1972: Lithuanian SSR State Prize for the best humorous work *1979: Lithuanian SSR State Prize for the best children's book Robotas ir peteliškė [The Robot and the Butterfly] *1996/1997: Best Children's and Adolescent Book of 1996 and IBBY Lithuania Chapter Award (1997) for Tiputapė *2000/2001: Best Children's and Adolescent Book of 2001 and IBBY Lithuania Chapter Award (2001) for Nebijokė *2005: Knight's Cross of the Order of the Lithuanian Grand Duke Gediminas *2007: IBBY Lithuania Chapter Award (for Kintas)"VYTAUTĖ ŽILINSKAITĖ", at Rubinaitis, children's literature information portal *2007: Children's Literature Prize (for Kintas) ==References== Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:Lithuanian writers Category:Lithuanian children's writers
title: Vytautė Žilinskaitė
